alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 2:37PM MST until January 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Periods of snow will bring moderate to locally heavy snow in the valleys with heavy snow possible in the mountains. * Gusty winds on Friday will produce blowing snow and reduce visibility. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some uncertainly remains in exact amounts, but this will be a period of high impact winter weather for much of the region. Those with travel plans this weekend should pay close attention to the forecast and consider not traveling if possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
